answers.answer: Hello,unfortunately we are not doctors here.  We cannot diagnose what are describing.  It maybe an allergic reaction to something or it may be something else.If the problem doesn't ressolve within a few days, recommend you to see your doctor.Please keep your blood sugar under good control, as high blood sugars can complicate many conditions.Hope you feel better soon.

question: I have type 2 diabetes and have a all body problem hard clusters of raised lumps all over and they are not red..what is up?
title: clusters of lumps all over
